comment: A directory in the local file system containing the CAMSS Assessments to be processed.
A directory containing artefacts used as input for the ETL operations, e.g. RML files, amongst other.
A directory containing the artefacts produced during the ETL operations, e.g. TTL files.
The file containing the parameters for the connections for persistence.
The file containing the parameters for the management of the CAMSS criteria.
